# MultiTelegram
Panel for using Telegram Desktop with different user folders.

### [Download the latest release here!](https://github.com/vargastomas/Tirabolas-3000/releases/latest)
<div>
  <a href="#-installation">
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/vargastomas/MultiTelegram/total?label=Downloads&labelColor=0c0d10&style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64," alt="alldownloads">
  </a>
  <a href="#%EF%B8%8F-license">
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/github/license/vargastomas/MultiTelegram?label=License&labelColor=0c0d10&style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64," alt="license">
  </a><br>
</div>

## ✨ Summary
Manage user folders containing your Telegram sessions with a handy manager.

### Features
* Use different user folders for Telegram Desktop.
* Use up to 32 profiles (User Folders).
* Create new sessions using new user folders.

<img src=./assets/screenshot-01.png width=50%>

<hr>
